text: Bridget Ann Brink is an American politician. She was the United States Ambassador to Ukraine since 2022 until 2025. In April 2022, she was nominated by President Joe Biden to be the United States ambassador to Ukraine. She was the United States Ambassador to Slovakia from August 20, 2019 until May 2022 during the Donald Trump and Biden administration. ==References== Category:Living people Category:Ambassadors of the United States Category:Politicians from Michigan
title: Bridget A. Brink
